title: Wood joints
creator_credit: Moreland-Latchford Productions, James McCormick and Joe Jayward
brief_description: Precise camerawork shows clearly how the end butt joint is made, how to make a rabbet joint, how a dado joint is formed, and the difference between the dado joint and the groove joint. Also demonstrates the technique of using dowels to add strength to a joint and how to make a lap joint.
